verbose_text: XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR After elucidating the mechanism of SpCas9, numerous modifications were made to this enzyme, such as the removal of endonuclease activity (dCas9), attenuating the endonuclease activity to that of a nickase (SpCas9D10A).
evidence: attenuating the endonuclease activity to that of a nickase
